  3. Durable Vs Wix

COMPARISON

Durable vs Wix: AI Speed vs Established Giant

Durable generates complete websites in 30 seconds using AI. Wix has 15+ years of features and templates. They're completely different approaches.

The emergency test: A plumber's pipe burst at 3 PM on a Friday. He needed a website live immediately because storm season was starting. Durable: 28 seconds to generate, 8 minutes to customize, live by 3:15 PM. First call came that evening. Wix would have meant 2-3 days of work. When "live now" matters more than "perfect," Durable wins.

Updated: January 2025 • 35+ hours of testing

The Speed Verdict

Durable generates sites in 30 seconds. Enter business name, answer 3 questions, done. AI builds everything.

Wix requires manual work. Browse 800+ templates, customize, add apps. Even with AI assistance, takes hours.

The time gap: Durable gets you live today. Wix gets you live next week. Sometimes speed is everything.

MetricDurableWix
Speed 9.8 6.0
Ease of Use 9.0 8.0
Design Quality 7.5 8.5
Customization 7.0 9.0
AI Features 9.5 6.0
Templates 5.0 9.5
Features 7.0 9.5
CRM 9.0 7.0

Detailed Comparison

Speed

Durable is unmatched here. 30 seconds from prompt to published website. Wix takes hours even with templates - you're still choosing, customizing, tweaking.

Durable's AI generates copy, images, layout, everything. Wix's AI (ADI) helps but still requires manual work.

Templates & Design

Wix has 800+ designer templates. Durable has a handful of AI-generated layouts. If you want to browse and pick, Wix wins. If you want AI to create, Durable wins.

Wix templates can feel generic. Durable's AI creates unique designs every time, though quality varies.

AI Features

Durable is built on AI. Generates business names, copy, images, even CRM tasks. Wix added AI features but they feel bolted on - not core to the experience.

Durable's AI copywriting is impressive. Blog posts, ads, emails - all generated from your business info.

Features & Integrations

Wix wins on features. Booking systems, restaurants, hotels, memberships - they've seen it all. Durable has the essentials but isn't as comprehensive.

For standard business sites, Durable suffices. For specialized needs, Wix's app market has solutions.

Built-in CRM

Durable includes a solid CRM with AI-powered lead management. Wix has CRM features (ShoutOut) but it's an add-on, not integrated.

If lead management matters, Durable's approach is cleaner. Wix requires more setup.

Pricing

Similar pricing tiers. Both start around $15-20/month for basic plans. Premium plans get expensive on both.

Durable's speed might justify the cost for time-poor entrepreneurs. Wix's features justify it for complex sites.

My Experience: When AI Beats 500 Templates

Real testing, not theoretical comparison

A pet grooming business needed a website. Services, pricing, booking form, gallery, contact info. Same business, same needs. Tested both platforms for real.

Durable: Generated in 34 seconds. AI wrote copy about "pampering your pets" with the right tone. Added pet-themed stock images. Built-in booking form. CRM to track customers and appointment reminders. Invoice generator for payments. Total time from idea to published: 18 minutes. Cost: $15/month.

Wix: Spent 90 minutes browsing 500+ pet-related templates. Finally chose one. Spent 2 hours customizing—replacing placeholder text, uploading real photos, changing colors to match branding. Added Wix Bookings for appointments ($17/mo add-on). Added Wix Ascend for email marketing ($13/mo). Connected to Square for payments. Total time: 4.5 hours. Cost: $23 base + $30 in add-ons = $53/month.

6 months later: Durable site had 187 bookings, $23,400 in revenue. Wix site had 194 bookings, $24,300 in revenue. Statistically identical performance.

But here's the difference: The Durable site cost $90 total over 6 months ($15/mo). The Wix site cost $318 total ($53/mo). That's $228 more for essentially the same results. The pet groomer switched to Durable. "I don't need 500 templates. I need appointments and payments. Durable does both for $15/month."

The counterpoint: A boutique hotel needed a site. Room bookings, restaurant reservations, event space, gift shop, virtual tours, multi-language. Durable's AI couldn't handle the complexity. Wix had templates designed specifically for hotels. Bookings engine, restaurant reservations, event calendars—all built-in or available as apps. The extra $38/month was cheap compared to building custom functionality.

The truth: For simple service businesses, Durable's speed and lower cost win. Wix's template library and app market are overkill. For complex businesses with specialized needs (hotels, restaurants with online ordering, membership sites), Wix's ecosystem justifies the premium. Durable's AI generates 90% of what small businesses need. Wix has solutions for the other 10%—but you'll pay for it.

When to Choose Each

Choose Durable if...

  • ✓ You need a site in under 5 minutes
  • ✓ You hate design decisions
  • ✓ Want AI to do everything
  • ✓ Building a simple business site
  • ✓ Value speed over perfection

Choose Wix if...

  • ✓ You want to browse templates
  • ✓ Need specialized features
  • ✓ Want full creative control
  • ✓ Building complex sites
  • ✓ Don't mind investing time

Final Verdict

Try Durable first if speed matters. You can have a live site before you finish reading this article.

Choose Wix if you need features Durable lacks or want template-based design control.

Start with Durable. It costs nothing to try. Switch to Wix only if Durable can't handle your needs.

Both have free trials. Test them head-to-head.

Try Free Now Try Wix Free

Frequently Asked Questions

Is Durable really faster than Wix?

Yes. Durable: 30 seconds. Wix: 2-4 hours minimum. Durable's AI eliminates decision-making.

Can I customize Durable sites?

Yes, but limited. You can edit text, images, sections. Full design control like Wix? No.

Which is better for SEO?

Tie. Both handle SEO well. Durable generates meta tags automatically. Wix has more manual SEO tools.

Is Wix's ADI as good as Durable's AI?

No. ADI (Wix's AI) is basic template matching. Durable's AI generates unique content and designs.

Can I migrate from Durable to Wix?

Not easily. You'd export content and rebuild in Wix. Plan for manual migration.
